channel.title: Posts on owenqi
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on owenqi

item.title: EDA - in progress
item.description: This post is a practice note based on tutorials from tutorial 1 and tutorial 2 towards my thesis. Data was downloaded from British Geological Survey as “DPHE/BGS National Hydrochemical Survey”, describing various groundwater quality parameters for several thousand wells measured by the British Geological Survey throughout Bangladesh in 1998-1999. The dataset contains the results of the survey of 3534 boreholes from 61 out of 64 districts in Bangladesh.

item.title: An R Markdown Examples
item.description: This post is mainly use for examine the rendering of the theme of the blog. The main aspect that I am care about is the support and hightlight of common use programming languages in this blog such as R and Python, some of the R code I put in this post are simple and non-informative. R Studio To work with R and R Markdown, for starters, Install R Install the lastest version of RStudio Install knitr package using install.
